title: Update search keywords
contents:

更新搜尋關鍵字link

Update search keywordslink

你可以透過向主題新增關鍵字來幫助讀者在 Angular 文件中找到這些主題。關鍵字透過將替代術語和相關概念與主題相關聯來幫助讀者查詢主題。

You can help readers find the topics in the Angular documentation by adding keywords to a topic. Keywords help readers find topics by relating alternate terms and related concepts to a topic.

在angular.io中，讀者可以用：

In angular.io, readers search for content by using:

  • 外部搜尋，例如使用google.com

    External search, such as by using google.com

  • 每頁頂部的搜尋框

    The search box at the top of each page

透過向主題新增相關關鍵字，可以使這些方法中的每一種都更有效。

Each of these methods can be made more effective by adding relevant keywords to the topics.

更新主題中的搜尋關鍵字link

To update search keywords in a topiclink

在瀏覽器中執行這些步驟。

Perform these steps in a browser.

  1. 導航到要新增或更新搜尋關鍵字的主題。

    Navigate to the topic to which you want to add or update search keywords.

  2. 確定你要新增到主題的搜尋關鍵字。
    關鍵字應該是與主題相關並且在主題標題中找不到的單詞。

    Decide what search keywords you'd like to add to the topic.
    Keywords should be words that relate to the topic and are not found in the topic headings.

  3. 開啟主題的編輯檔案頁面進行小的更改。

    Open the topic's Edit file page to make a minor change.

  4. 使用你的關鍵字在主題末尾新增或更新 @searchKeywords 標籤。@searchKeywords 標籤採用一組由空格分隔的單字關鍵字。標籤和關鍵字必須用大括號括起來。此處顯示了一個範例標籤，以將這些關鍵字新增到頁面：route 、 router 、 routing和Navigation。

    Add or update the @searchKeywords tag at the end of the topic with your keywords. The @searchKeywords tag takes a set of single-word keywords that are separated by spaces. The tag and the keywords must be enclosed in curly brackets. A sample tag is shown here to add these keywords to a page: route, router, routing, and navigation.

    {@searchKeywords route router routing navigation}

  5. 在主題原始碼的末尾更新或新增 @reviewed 條目。

    Update or add the @reviewed entry at the end of the topic's source code.

  6. Propose your changes as described in make a minor change.
